title: Be Nice or Else!: And What's in It for You
description: Congratulations! You're about to join the planet's largest celebration of Be Nice! This exquisitely irresistible and highly practical guide shows you how to start your own be nice revolution at home, at work, and even with total strangers. You work hard at so many things-getting ahead, being successful, and even feeling happy. As it turns out, being nice is the one to absolutely guarantee a life you love. Besides, being nice is easy, and the rewards are immeasurable.
author: Winn Claybaugh
